name: adc_ltm_vlan_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()

def getLTMVLANList():
    '''
    to get the list of LTM vlan list

    '''

    ltm_lan_list = []
    adc_ltm_lan_list = connect_db.appviewx.lv.find()
    for device in adc_ltm_lan_list:
        ltm_lan_list.append(device)
    return ltm_lan_list
description: To get a list of LTM vlan
_keywords: To get a list of LTM vlan
